about.description:
NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network computations,
a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.

The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA cuQuantum
Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,
you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html
about.summary: cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations

name: cutensornet
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.23.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: cutensornet
  version: 2.0.0
source:
  - sha256: 6432abc24269b750e2049b32f0ad9d9f573c90af6fd3505434999d0217445d46
    url: https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuquantum/redist/cuquantum/linux-ppc64le/cuquantum-linux-ppc64le-22.11.0.13-archive.tar.xz
  - sha256: cfc249a71a8a6aab9f76f90c61ce7cd26cde69e335878134c17122143acbfbb1
    url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum/archive/refs/tags/v22.11.0.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports_from:
    - nvcc_linux-ppc64le 11.2.*
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/libcublas.so*'
    - '*/libcublasLt.so*'
    - '*/libcusolver.so*'
    - '*/libcusparse.so*'
    - '*/libcutensor.so*'
  number: 0
  post-link: post-link
  run_exports:
    - cutensornet >=2.0.0,<3.0a0 mpi_openmpi_*
  script:
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/include
    - mv include/cutensornet* $PREFIX/include/
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/lib
    - mv lib/libcutensornet.so* $PREFIX/lib/
    - $GCC -shared -std=c11 -fPIC -I$CUDA_PATH/include -I$PREFIX/include distributed_interfaces/cutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.c
      -o $PREFIX/lib/libcutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.so
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-activate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/cutn-activate.sh"
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-deactivate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/cutn-deactivate.sh"
  string: mpi_openmpi_h91f16c7_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.39 heb37b50_1
    - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.39 h5e55cfe_11
    - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 10.4.0 hb2bed53_19
    - gcc_linux-ppc64le 10.4.0 hc879d7e_11
    - kernel-headers_linux-ppc64le 3.10.0 h23d7e6c_13
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.39 hea198f4_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-ppc64le 10.4.0 ha78d8ae_19
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 hbc1322c_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 hbc1322c_19
    - libsanitizer 10.4.0 h8902bdb_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 h99369c6_19
    - nvcc_linux-ppc64le 11.2 h65ee2f8_21
    - sed 4.8 ha07698b_0
    - sysroot_linux-ppc64le 2.17 h395ec9b_13
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 hbc1322c_19
    - libgfortran-ng 12.2.0 hfdc3801_19
    - libgfortran5 12.2.0 hda65b67_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 hbc1322c_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 h99369c6_19
    - libzlib 1.2.13 hb283c62_4
    - mpi 1.0 openmpi
    - openmpi 4.1.4 ha6b021e_101
    - zlib 1.2.13 hb283c62_4
  run:
    - cudatoolkit >=11.0,<12
    - cutensor >=1.6.1,<2
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - openmpi >=4.1.4,<5.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - ./cutn_run_test.sh 22.11.0.13
    - echo $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libcutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.so
  files:
    - cutn_run_test.sh
    - test_load_elf.c
  requires:
    - cudatoolkit 11.2.*
    - gcc_linux-ppc64le 10.*
    - git
    - gxx_linux-ppc64le 10.*
    - nvcc_linux-ppc64le 11.2.*
about:
  description: 'NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network
    computations,

    a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.


    The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA
    cuQuantum

    Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,

    you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -

    https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum
  doc_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cutensornet/index.html
  home: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuquantum-sdk
  license: LicenseRef-cuQuantum-Software-License-Agreement
  license_file: docs/cuQuantum_license.pdf
  license_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html
  summary: 'cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations'
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - DmitryLyakh
    - JeremyWangNVDA
    - leofang
    - mtjrider
    - yangcal
